text: Mária Mikolajová (born 13 June 1999) is a Slovak footballer who plays as a midfielder for St. PöltenProfile at SKN St. Pölten and has appeared for the Slovakia women's national team. ==Career== Mikolajová has been capped for the Slovakia national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak women's footballers Category:Slovakia women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:AC Sparta Praha (women) players Category:FSK St. Pölten-Spratzern players Category:Expatriate women's footballers in the Czech Republic Category:Slovak expatriate sportspeople in the Czech Republic Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Austria Category:Slovak expatriate sportspeople in Austria Category:Partizán Bardejov players Category:ÖFB-Frauenliga players Category:Czech First Division (women) players
title: Mária Mikolajová
